title: Vegetarian Christmas stuffing
ingredients: ['450g day-old bread, torn into pieces', '1 (295g) tin condensed cream of mushroom soup', '300ml vegetable stock', '2 tablespoons water', '1 teaspoon all-purpose seasoning', 'salt and pepper to taste', 'Optional additions', '8 tablespoons cooked wild rice', '4 tablespoons dried cranberries', '50g fresh mushrooms', '8 tablespoons chopped pecans', '4 tablespoons cubed apples']
